name: Cambridge Networks Ltd
description: Cambridge Networks is a managed service provider operating within the SME sector.  We partner with clients to understand their business, which in turn helps us provide better support. We offer proactive, reliable, and responsive service, and aim to be technically inspiring. Most of all, we provide a friendly level of support. With a diverse mix of experience, our company is best suited to support SME businesses in and around the Cambridgeshire area.
